title: Can someone please explain to me why junglers are good for the game?
body:
They just play PVE and occasionally come by a perfectly fair 1v1 or 2v2 lane and ruin it.
How does this make the game more fun for anyone?
I don't like it when EITHER junglers come to my lane. 
It's bad enough that I have to carry my entire team lategame, at least let me have a fair laning phase.
